Header: Championship leader Tanak sets early pace in Finland
Content: Championship leader Ott Tanak laid down a marker to the rest of the field when he was fastest in the shakedown at the Rally of Finland. The Estonian was .3 of a second quicker than Belgium’s Thierry Neuville, with Ireland’s Craig Breen a further .8 seconds further back.Frenchman Sebastien Ogier, defending champion and Tanak’s closest challenger, was equal sixth alongside Northern Ireland’s Kris Meeke and Finland’s Jari-Matti Latvala. Tanak tops the standings by just for points from Ogier, with Neuville seven off the overall lead.
